items.name: Achari Baigan
items.description: A popular North Indian dish that combines the distinct flavors of tender eggplants with a tangy and spicy pickle masala. The pickling spices infuse the eggplants with a unique and tantalizing taste.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar

items.name: Chicken Changazi
items.description: A delicious and aromatic Indian dish that features succulent pieces of chicken marinated in a flavorful blend of spices, yogurt, and herbs, and then cooked to perfection. A popular choice for those seeking a flavorful and indulgent chicken dish with a touch of traditional Indian flair.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar

items.name: Chicken Cutlet
items.description: A popular snack or appetizer made with ground or minced chicken, mixed with spices, herbs, and other ingredients. The mixture is shaped into patties or cutlet shapes, coated with breadcrumbs and then shallow fried until golden and crispy.

items.name: Lemon Rice
items.description: Rice, cashews, chillies and other spices stir fried together and mixed with lime juice. Served with achar and papad

items.name: Palak Chole
items.description: A delicious and nutritious Indian dish that combines the goodness of spinach (palak) with chickpeas (chole). Cooked with onions, tomatoes, and a blend of aromatic spices such as cumin, coriander, turmeric, and garam masala resulting is a creamy and well-balanced curry.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar

items.name: Lamb Sukka
items.description: A South Indian dish made with tender pieces of lamb cooked in a dry and spicy masala. The dish is finished with a sprinkle of fresh curry leaves and coconut, giving it a rich and aromatic taste.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar

items.name: Pinewheel Samosa
items.description: A savory Indian snack that features a spiced potato filling rolled into a flaky pastry dough, sliced and baked to create a pinwheel shape. (6 pieces)

items.name: Rajma Chawal
items.description: Red kidney beans cooked in a flavourful gravy with onion, tomato, ginger, garlic and spices and topped with fresh garam masala and coriander. Served with steamy rice and papad.

items.name: Bhindi Do Pyaza
items.description: Okra cooked in onion tomato based gravy with freshly ground spices topped with petals of onion and tomato
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar

items.name: Malabar Chicken Peralan
items.description: A traditional dish from the Malabar region of Kerala, India. It is a flavorful and mildly spiced chicken curry that features tender pieces of chicken cooked in a fragrant blend of spices and coconut milk.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar

items.name: Egg Roll
items.description: A popular street food and appetizer that typically consists of a thin egg omelette wrapped around a filling of vegetables and various seasonings and sauces.

items.name: Tawa Pulao
items.description: A flavorful and spicy dish made by stir-frying cooked rice with a variety of vegetables, spices, and aromatics.

items.name: Kathal Biryani
items.description: Jackfruit cooked with a special spice blend and layered with partially cooked basmati rice, allowing the flavors to meld together with the rice. Served with a side of yogurt raita and papad.

items.name: Chicken Tikka Biryani
items.description: Spicy chicken grilled over coal and cooked in a flavourful gravy of onion and tomato and other spices together with aromatic basmati rice and fried onions. Served with yogurt dip + achar + papad

items.name: Kurkuri Aloo Tikki Chaat
items.description: Crispy potato patty smeared with  with spicy chutney, sweet chutney and fresh corriander and pomagranate seeds and yogurt

items.name: Lasuni Palak Kichidi
items.description: A flavorful and nutritious Indian dish that combines spinach (palak) and rice (kichidi) with a prominent garlic (lasuni) flavor. The dish is prepared by cooking rice and spinach together with a tempering of garlic, cumin seeds, and other spices

items.name: Veg Hakka Noodles
items.description: Indo-Chinese dish with assorted veggies cooked with chinese sauces and noodles
items.extra: make it special with some veg manchurian gravy

items.name: Chicken Hakka Noodles
items.description: Indo-Chinese dish with assorted veggies and chicken cooked with chinese sauces and noodles.
items.extra: make it special with some chicken manchurian gravy

items.name: Dhokla
items.description: Dhokla is a traditional Gujarati dish made from a fermented batter of chickpea flour, rice flour and yogurt. Steamed and then cut into small, square pieces.

items.name: Tamrind Rice
items.description: A tangy and flavorful South Indian rice dish. It is made by mixing cooked rice with a special tamarind-based sauce, spices, curry leaves and garnished with roasted peanuts.

items.name: Hyderabadi Nizami Handi
items.description: Mix veggies cooked in a base of buttery creamy thick gravy made of onion, tomato, ginger, garlic and cashew nut with fresh garam masala and topped with fresh cream and coriander
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Lamb Dalcha
items.description: A popular delicacy in the regions of Hyderabad and Tamil Nadu. A traditional Indian dish that combines tender pieces of lamb with lentils and a medley of spices. The gravy is made with a base of lentils, which adds a creamy and velvety texture to the dish. The lentils are cooked until soft and then combined with the lamb, creating a hearty and protein-rich combination.
items.extra: Make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + papad and achar

items.name: Inji Puli Chicken Wings
items.description: A south Indian inspired appetizer that features crispy chicken wings coated in a tangy and spicy ginger-tamarind sauce. The dish is a perfect balance of sweet, sour, and spicy flavors.

items.name: Missal Pav
items.description: A popular street food of Mumbai. Mixed sprouts boiled and cooked with onion, tomato, ginger, garlic, chilles and spicy masala. Topped with some fresh coriander. Served with 2 buns, farsan and onions

items.name: Chana Ghassi
items.description: A popular vegetarian dish from the coastal region of Karnataka, India. It is a tangy and spicy curry made with chickpeas (channa) and a flavorful coconut-based gravy.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Kori Ghassi
items.description: Manglorean chicken curry with curry leaves, spices and coconut milk
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 paratha or rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Railway Style Cutlet
items.description: A nostalgic treat made of deep fried spicy potato. It's a perfect texure of soft potato filling with a crispy outer layer. Served with spicy green chutney (4 cutlets)

items.name: Masala Bhat
items.description: Rice cooked with onion, tomato, potato, and other vegetables with spices and garnished with coriander

items.name: Paneer Angara
items.description: A north Indian dish made with Indian cottage cheese, onion and capsicum marinated in hung curd and variety of spices, smoked and cooked in a thicky gravy.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas + achar + papad + side salad

items.name: Murg Musallam
items.description: A regal and sumptuous dish that originates from the Mughlai cuisine of India. The gravy is rich and aromatic, made with a combination of onions, tomatoes, ginger, garlic, and a variety of spices. This creates a luscious and flavorful sauce that coats the chicken beautifully.
items.extra: make it a meal with 2 parathas or rice + side salad + achar + papad

items.name: Paneer Pakoda
items.description: A popular Indian snack made with paneer (Indian cottage cheese) that is coated in a spiced gram flour batter and deep-fried to crispy perfection.

items.name: Kerai Molagutal
items.description: A traditional South Indian dish made with a spinach (keerai) cooked in a spicy coconut-based gravy. Spiced with a blend of aromatic South Indian spices, such as cumin, coriander, and black pepper, gives it a bold and flavorful taste. Served with rice and papad.

items.name: Soya Chunk Pulao
items.description: A nutritious and flavourful rice dish made with soya chunks. The soya chunks are soaked, cooked, and then added to the fragrant pulao, enhancing the protein content and providing a meaty texture. This delicious and wholesome meal is enjoyed with raita for a complete and balanced meal.

items.name: Chicken Kashmiri Pulao
items.description: A flavourful and aromatic rice dish with roots in the beautiful region of Kashmir, India. This dish combines succulent pieces of chicken with fragrant basmati rice, along with a delightful mix of spices, dried fruits, and nuts. The rice is cooked in a seasoned broth, infused with aromatic spices like cardamom, cinnamon, and saffron, which lend their distinctive flavours which give the dish its vibrant colour. Served with a side of raita and papad.

items.name: Shami Kebab
items.description: Lipsmacking street food from the northern part of India. Minced meat and chana dal mixed with different spices and ground into a smooth mixture and shapped into a patty and shallow fried. Served with green chutney on the side. (3 pieces)

items.name: Langarwali Dal and Chawal
items.description: Made with a combination of lentils, primarily consisting of split black lentils (urad dal) and split Bengal gram (chana dal). The lentils are cooked until soft and then tempered with a blend of aromatic spices such as cumin, mustard seeds, asafoetida, and dried red chilies. Served with rice.

items.name: Veg Navratna Pulao
items.description: Assorted veggies, cashew nut and rasins cooked together with spices & fragnant basmati rice, topped with fresh coriander and mint leaves. Served with a side of mint dip + papad + achar

items.name: Dindigul Biryani
items.description: A flavorful and aromatic style of biryani that originates from the city of Dindigul in Tamil Nadu, India. It is renowned for its unique blend of spices and the use of small grain rice, which imparts a distinct flavor and texture to the dish.

items.name: Kathi Roll
items.description: Flaky egg paratha, cucumber, pickled onions and lime juice wrapped into a pefect roll. Served with green spicy chutney.

items.name: Sambar Rice
items.description: A comfort meal from the south of India. Lentils and veggies cooked together with tamarind, and freshly made sambar masala tempered with mustard seeds and curry leaves. Served with rice + papad
